mapper.insert: insert into bd_check_groups (cgid, checkid, groupname, pcajs, zb, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, flag) values (#{cgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{pcajs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{zb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update bd_check_groups set checkid = #{checkid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, groupname = #{groupname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pcajs = #{pcajs,jdbcType=INTEGER}, zb = #{zb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, remarks = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where cgid = #{cgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select cgid, checkid, groupname, pcajs, zb, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by,date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_groups where cgid = #{cgid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select cgid, checkid, groupname, pcajs, zb, create_by, date_format(create_date, '%Y/%m/%d') create_date, update_by,date_format(update_date, '%Y/%m/%d') update_date, remarks, flag from bd_check_groups
